title:
Setting the start level for declarative services
If you use OSGi DS services outside Eclipse RCP applications, you need to ensure that the org.eclipse.equinox.ds plug-ins is started before any application plug-in which wants to consume a service.
You can ensure this in your launch configuration by setting the _auto-start_ field to true and the start level lower than 4 (4 is the default value) for the org.eclipse.equinox.ds plug-in
